metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Event Viewer Child Process
metadata.comment: Detects uncommon or suspicious child processes of "eventvwr.exe" which might indicate a UAC bypass attempt

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\eventvwr.exe')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\mmc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\werfault.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\werfault.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects uncommon or suspicious child processes of "eventvwr.exe" which might indicate a UAC bypass attempt
